title: 21 Beauty Deals to Snag During Dermstore's Anniversary Sale
description: In case you missed it, online retailer Dermstore is hosting its Summer Sale on skin care, makeup, and more. From now until May 26, you can use code "SUN" at checkout and get up to 20 percent off on select brands. Plus, you can get double points on purchases made from specific brands if you're a rewards member (you can sign up for free here), which can be converted into 10 percent back on future purchases. Whether you want to change your routine and try something new or stock up on your favorite items, this is the best time to shop on a budget. You can score discounts on medical-grade skin care from Elta MD and Skin Medica, body care, and top-selling favorites from brands like Elemis, Dr. Dennis Gross Skincare, Cosrx, and so much more. With more than 6,500 products on sale, we made life a little easier for you and rounded up the best beauty deals during Dermstore's Anniversary Sale. Stocking up on sunscreen? Try out our editor favorites that leave no white cast and feel weightless and hydrating on the skin. While you're at it, pick up an editor-backed vitamin C serum. If you have acne-prone skin, now's your chance to try out the bestselling Skin Perfecting 2% BHA Liquid Exfoliant from Paula's Choice or stock up on pimple patches. Try the bestselling long-wearing Double Wear Stay-in-Place Foundation from Estée Lauder for the summer or a clean conditioning mascara formula from RMS Beauty. Keep reading for all our picks ahead.
author: Anvita Reddy
